mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(tdate), 'YYYY') AS earliestYear, -- 최소 날짜 연도 TO_CHAR(MIN(tdate), 'MM') AS earliestMonth, -- 최소 날짜 월 TO_CHAR(MAX(tdate), 'YYYY') AS latestYear, -- 최대 날짜 연도 TO_CHAR(MAX(tdate), 'MM') AS latestMonth, -- 최대 날짜 월 TO_CHAR(MIN(tdate), 'IYYY') AS earliestIsoYear, -- 최소 날짜 ISO 연도 TO_CHAR(MIN(tdate), 'IW') AS earliestIsoWeek, -- 최소 날짜 ISO 주 TO_CHAR(MAX(tdate), 'IYYY') AS latestIsoYear, -- 최대 날짜 ISO 연도 TO_CHAR(MAX(tdate), 'IW') AS latestIsoWeek -- 최대 날짜 ISO 주 FROM nol_ticket_date

SELECT TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'MM') AS tmonth, t.tno, t.name AS tName, SUM(t.price * r.quantity - r.discount_price) AS monthlySales FROM nol_ticket_date td JOIN nol_reserve r ON td.tdno = r.tdno JOIN nol_ticket t ON td.tno = t.tno WHERE td.tdate BETWEEN TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{date}, 1, 4) || '0101', 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{date}, 1, 4) || '1231', 'YYYYMMDD') AND td.tdate < SYSDATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'MM'), t.tno, t.name ORDER BY TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'MM'), t.tno

SELECT TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tdate, t.tno, t.name AS tName, SUM(t.price * r.quantity - r.discount_price) AS dailySales FROM nol_ticket_date td JOIN nol_reserve r ON td.tdno = r.tdno JOIN nol_ticket t ON td.tno = t.tno WHERE TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') AND td.tdate < SYSDATE GROUP BY td.tdate, t.tno, t.name ORDER BY td.tdate, t.tno

SELECT TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tdate, t.tno, t.name AS tName, SUM(t.price * r.quantity - r.discount_price) AS dailySales FROM nol_ticket_date td JOIN nol_reserve r ON td.tdno = r.tdno JOIN nol_ticket t ON td.tno = t.tno WHERE TO_CHAR(td.tdate, 'IYYY IW') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'IYYY IW') AND td.tdate < SYSDATE GROUP BY td.tdate, t.tno, t.name ORDER BY td.tdate, t.tno
